attributes.additional_details: Gordon Brown & Alistair Darling have spent the last 12 to 14 months writing their squalid memoirs into book form for personal gain. They have done this whilst being paid over £7000 a month by the TAXPAYER plus MASSIVE expenses to be MP`s. Neither have spent any time attending to their duties as MP`s.In the PRIVATE SECTOR they would have been dismissed summarily.They should be prosecuted for GROSS DERELICTION OF DUTY.
